header.title: wxCalendarEvent

description.p: The wxCalendarEvent class is used together with wxCalendarCtrl.
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxDateEvent wxCommandEvent wxEvent

func.fsummary: Returns the week day on which the user clicked in EVT_CALENDAR_WEEKDAY_CLICKED handler.

desc.p: Returns the week day on which the user clicked in EVT_CALENDAR_WEEKDAY_CLICKED handler.
It doesn't make sense to call this function in other handlers.
